title: Bloot eigendom
description: When a beautiful young woman arrives in the morning looking for Govert, Simon hires her as the maid. But mother fires her before the afternoon is through. Youngest son Thijs demands to have the attic for himself.

title: Moeder's geheim
description: Thijs discovers that his mother has a secret rendezvous with Udu Zwanenpark, Govert's father who as it turns out did not disappear 30 years ago, but moved to Aruba to get rich instead.

title: Marmercake
description: While searching for Roman artifacts in Uncle Gerards's garden, Thijs finds a bomb from the second world war. Govert is swindled out of his brand new computer soft-wear.

title: Zeg 'ns Aaa
description: Gerard and Tineke are staying in Nel's house after their house blew up. Gerard discovers that Govert plays a part in Zeg 'ns AAA. Nel accompanies Tineke to an environmental meeting. Thijs is going for his B-swimming certificate.

title: Hoogspanning
description: Tineke is leaving Gerard and the rest of his family behind. Govert is about to start his own computer software company. Thijs is working for super boy instant love service. Desperate for money, Gerard tries to steal some of Nel's savings, but loses it almost instantly paying off a couple of phony land-meters.

title: In het schip
description: Simon and Gerard share a cell while Thijs puts an end to his career as escort boy. Govert needs to get married fast so he can get his inheritance and use it to invest in his computer business.

title: De zure appel
description: Simon is in the hospital after jumping into the sea during last season's cliffhanger. Nurse Babbette has fallen head over heels in love with him. Gerard also has a new lover, Wanda, having found out Tineke was unfaithful to him.

title: Thuiskomst
description: Simon is being released from hospital against his wishes. While organizing his homecoming, Thijs meets Leo Bussenburg. Gerard neglects to show up on the first day of his new environmentally friendly job.

title: Harde woorden
description: Simon is being stalked by Sylvia, but has fallen in love with Nurse Babette. Therefore he has decided to leave home and get a job. Upset, Nel hurries to lawyer Born's brand new office, closely followed by Thijs.

title: Zachte dwang
description: Jacob Raaspit has returned after being M.I.A. for 35 years. He won't leave again until he's seen Simon, but nobody knows his whereabouts. Govert is afraid Jacob is after Nel's money, since they are still legally married.

title: Geld en goed
description: Simon is struggling to meet his deadlines as a newspaper reporter. Tineke has returned from Tibet and asks to speak to Nel. Shirley breaks up with Thijs by letter. Just when Thijs is at his most vulnerable, the two swindlers who took a lot of money from Gerard in the fifth installment of series one return to the household.

title: Uitvlucht
description: Nel and the boys are about to go on holiday, until Thijs notices they are one day early. Govert and Rob van Zijl come to the conclusion that Gloria has been stringing them both along. Meanwhile Simon has Babette and Sylvia fighting for his affections.

title: Omgevlogen
description: On their flight back from Aruba, Nel, Simon, Govert & Thijsje reminisce about their lives and their loves.

title: Op de koffie
description: The next door neighbors claim that Thijs' cat Roeland is theirs (and called Kees). Gerard has been experimenting with Govert's computers. Thijs competes in a TV quiz and wins another trip to Aruba for four.

title: Schrijven en wrijven
description: The family Rolls Royce has been trashed by movie director Dick Maas. Nel meets with publisher Leo Bussenberg about her novel. Govert meets Marjolein Koopmans, who is actually working for Prinsen, Van Hoek & Waanders.

title: In de Vlaamsche pot
description: When Hetty comes over with the first chapters of Nel's novel, Simon takes her upstairs, despite appearing in gossip magazines with Babette. Later he invites Thijs along to one of Babette's society parties. Marjolein admits to Govert that she work for Prinsen, Van Hoek and Waanders. Everybody end up going to De Vlaamse Pot

title: Waarheen, waarvoor
description: Nel is going to Dr. Bulders funeral in Lelystad. Simon pretends to have answered the call to return to his old army corps so he can spend some time with Babbette. Govert is about to play a tennis tournament against his ex partners. Thijs has taken a job as an assistant chef but ends up freeing a couple of lobsters. Bob demands to move in back with Wanda.

title: Van God los
description: Thijs is being stalked by Jehova's witness Mieke. Nel is changing all the names of her family members in her novel. She then decides she needs Simon's expertise in getting rid of the Jehova's influence on Thijs.

title: Een hoop geloof en liefde
description: Simon has left Babbette after catching her with Thom Hoffman. Govert is off on a business trip. Thijsje tries to find Mieke but ends up convinced that he is the new messiah himself.

title: Komen en gaan
description: Nel wants some solitude on the Mokerheide to finish her novel. Alphonse has taken over as her publisher now that Leo has given up on her. The helpful Belgian is also assisting Gerard with his inventions in the attic. James Adams has become Nel's chauffeur.

title: Om de tuin
description: The boys are glad to hear that Gerard and Alphonse are leaving, having finished their book of inventions. Rob en Gloria van Zijl have named their first child after Govert. Rob gets a visit from his uncle Paul Mastenbroek who tells him he owns the entire Van der Hoed mansion. Marjolein and Govert are planning to use Robbie's restaurant, Le Castor Aliéne, as their new workplace.

title: Wil en dank
description: The Van der Hoed house is about to be demolished, so burglars Johan and Diederik decide to pay it another visit (their fourth). Luckily for Thijs, Henkie Born comes to the rescue.

title: Water in wijn
description: Nel is finally being interviewed by Adriaan van Dis regarding her novel "Van der Hoed en de Rand". She asks her boys to sing a song, but Thijs wants to perform a poem on the show. But there is some confusion about the her inclusion in the show actually being valid.

title: Opkomst afkomst
description: Jacob Raaspit discovers that he isn't at deaths door after all. Nel has fallen in love with Albert van Rossum. Govert meets his father Edu and half brother Lesley. Thijs learns that Wim Kalff is his biological father.

title: Hangende pootjes
description: Six months have passed. Living in France, Nel is dismayed as Albert van Rossum has turned out to be a masochist. Staying in the States, Govert has found out that Marjolein is seeing an American movie director. Sharing a flat in Amsterdam, Simon is having trouble performing in bed. Left on his own in the family mansion, Thijs has made it into a complete pigsty.

title: Kat van huis
description: The entire family is back home again and arguing more than ever. Simon is ashamed of having erectile problems. Neighbor Ada Flinterman comes to claim Roeland the cat, whom she calls Kees. Lucky for Simon, Mr. Flinterman turns out to be a sexologist.

title: Vallen en opstaan
description: Gerard has finally found success as an inventor. Half the family bursts into Henk G. Born's office to do some business while Simon is secretly seeing sex therapist Flinterman.

title: Streepjes
description: Gerard reveals that his newfound wealth consists of him having found Nel's hidden treasures. Jacob is spending a lot of time with this grandson Danny to make up for not spending any with his own son Simon. Wim Kalff is blackmailing Nel for more money. Govert invites the entire family to Lesley's Danish restaurant to present his new electronic menu.

title: In de wolken
description: Govert has fallen in love with air hostess Bente Jaarsveld. Thijs tries to seduce Marion van Setten when she and her mother come to clean the house. Simon and Hetty visit Dr. Flinterman together but only end up arguing.

title: Op leven en dood
description: Nel is upset to read in the paper that Albert van Rossum has committed suicide. Simon and Hetty break off their vacation for the funeral. Rob van Zijl and Paul Mastenbroek corner Henk G. Born in Lesley's restaurant 'Buxtehude' (formerly 'Le Castor Aliéné').

title: Scherven
description: Nel gets word that Wim Kalff is getting married to Helen. Henkie Born has convinced Nel to sell her house and Paul Mastenbroek sends Johan & Diederik to pose as house painters. Born himself is surprised to receive a visit from his long lost mother.

title: Doen en laten
description: The attempt to burn down the Van der Hoek mansion has gone awry, but Govert and Gerard still end up staying at Lesley's restaurant. Simon has been living on the street for a week. Born decides to fight fire (Mastenbroek) with fire.

title: In voor- en achterdocht
description: Govert is surprised to find Thijs has fallen in love with Willeke van Keppelzoden, on whom he has always had a crush. Born and Mastenbroek strike a deal to work together.

title: Hebben en houden
description: Simon is moving out of the elderly home to marry Hetty. He also wants to get custody of his son Danny. Thijs has found another cat, Elsje, who appears to be the offspring of Roeland (before he got neutered).

title: Kind van de rekening
description: Simon learns that Danny's mother is still alive and he isn't actually Danny's father. Henk J. Pal buys back the restaurant Buxtehude and puts Jaap Klinkhamer (who turns out to be his son) in charge. Gerard is reunited with Wanda.

title: Confrontations
description: Nel and Leo are in England, Gorvert and Marjolein in America and Thijs is at home where he is renting the bulk of the house to an American family so he have it remodeled. Babbete comes over looking for Simon.

title: Trap na
description: Simon is suicidal again. Nel is lifting her way home from England after Leo was arrested there. Govert is being stalked by a woman from the airplane and Thijs opts to help Babbette find Simon.

title: Relapsus
description: Nel and her entire family are starring in a comedic play written by bestselling writer Floris Drempel. They receive good reviews based on the fact that most of them were drinking real alcohol during their performance.

title: Klusjes in huis
description: Thijs is convinced he has the talent to become a great thespian. Both Nel and Govert are being stalked, by Gea and Ingeborg respectively.

title: Een Oostenrijker
description: Born, Mastenbroek & Plantinga connive to swindle Govert & Ingeborg. Fred Bonkers, the delivery man who never misses an opportunity to use the Van der Hoek toilet, has offered to replace their rare toilet pot.

title: Potten en panne
description: Fred Bonkers brings over a toilet pot, followed closely by Mrs. Flinterman who claims it for herself. Simon has picked a fight with Floris Drempel at Hetty's housewarming party. This resulted in her booking Boudewijn Buch and going on a trip with him.

title: Hoe en waarom
description: Danny wants to be Simons son again. Thijs has been working himself through study books and now expects to get a certificate. Maria and Elsje and their young owners Anneke & Esmeralda come over to visit.

title: Kennis van zaken
description: Wanda has left Gerard for her ex Bob Waanders once more. Govert learns that Born, Mastenbroek & Plantinga have sold Ingeborg's building to Gerard at a profit for them and a loss for him.

title: Mooi geweest
description: Thijs has organized a big meeting for the benefit of the environment. Fred Bonkers visits psychiatrist Flinterman, but only to ask him for advice. Ingeborg Kuyten then mistakes Fred for Flinterman.

title: Tegen beter weten
description: Hetty returns unexpectedly, while Simon is still in the Molton Hotel with Babette. Simon hurts his leg climbing in through the window, and as Hetty and Babette cat fight, Marion (who also loves him) arrives to clean the house. Amatuer psychiatrist Bonkers turns out to have more problems than originally thought.

title: Bedenkingen
description: Nel has decided to move out of the house and live with Jacob in Wateringen. Bert Stompelmans comes by to claim Danny and reveals that Simon is the boys real father. Nel advices the troubled Henk Born to give up being a lawyer. Simon loses both of his girlfriends to Huub Stapel.

title: Wie wat waar
description: Marjolein returns from the States just as Govert wants to move in with Ingeborg. Thijs announces his engagement to Willeke, who has become a full partner in Born' law firm. Marion reveals she has had a love child with Simon. As the American family moves into the Van der Hoed home, Simon is the only one without a place to stay. He takes his mother's unpublished novel to the VPRO to see if they can make a sitcom out of it.
